name: GetProjectEmployeeGroupById
description: Use this endpoint to load a single Project employee group by id/number.

$ul:
**name**: Name of the employee group.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin, like

Sortable: false

**number**: The unique number of the employee group.

Sortable: true
